shinyap

The goal of shinyap is to provide easy access to the apps in the Shiny App-Packages book.

Installation

You can install the development version of shinyap from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mjfrigaard/shinyap")
library(shinyap)

Git/GitHub configuration

shinyap uses the gert package for Git/GitHub management (and assumes authentication was done automatically using the credentials package).1

Available app-packages

To see a list of the available app-packages in shinyap, use list_apps()2

list_apps()
#>    source               branch_name             updated
#> 1    <NA>                      main 2023-10-25 08:12:48

Clone an app 

get_app("app name")

Launch an app (or app package) 

launch_app("app name")
